resources.string:
Hi, my name is Karina. 

I love coding. 

Coding is a form of art because one can create whatever they can imagine through programming 
Fun fact is that my first programming language was Java. 

 I love the problem solving through trial and error that comes with coding. 
Sometimes I spend hours coding 
During those hours I can get a lot done or I can be stuck trying to solve one bug 

I am so grateful to have discovered my love for programming 

I'm happy that I have landed a software engineering role to further expand my skills 
I hope that in my role as a software engineer I can create something meaningful
